title: OPPO shares ColorOS 12 release timeline for a few more devices
content:
OPPO has been doing a great job of updating its devices to Android 12. Over the last few weeks, the company has rolled out stable and beta builds of ColorOS 12 based on Android 12 to a host of devices, including the Reno 4 series, the Reno 7 Pro 5G, F19 Pro, F17 Pro, and

The post OPPO shares ColorOS 12 release timeline for a few more devices appeared first on xda-developers.
description: OPPO today released the ColorOS 12 stable and beta release timelines for a few more devices, including the OPPO F19 and F19s, OPPO Reno 6 Pro 5G, and more.
